text: The 1993 Vuelta a España was the 48th edition of the Vuelta a España, one of cycling's Grand Tours. The Vuelta began in A Coruña, with an individual time trial on 26 April, and Stage 11 occurred on 6 May with a stage to Cerler. The race finished in Santiago de Compostela on 16 May. ==Stage 1== 26 April 1993 — A Coruña to A Coruña, (ITT) {| |Stage 1 result and general classification after Stage 1 {| class="wikitable" |- ! scope="col" | Rank !
